attributes.action: Scrap university charges/prescription charges for the English
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why do the English have to pay University fees and prescription charges when Scotland and Wales do not?  We all pay the same tax.  Why are the English being ripped off again, as we are supposedly all meant to be British?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
